title: 1.1.9 Soldering Desoldering
brief: Wear eye protection and work in a ventilated area.
Heat the joint, not the solder. Aim for a quick, shiny fillet.
Use wick or a pump to remove solder without lifting pads.

elements.content: Quick overview of soldering and desoldering best practices with links to class resources.
Build an LED board with correct polarity and pass continuity tests. Joints must be smooth and shiny.
